name: Love waifu #154 - Wedding Night Temptation
description: The sheets tangle around her as she reclines, her wedding lingerie barely containing her voluptuous form. Her lips part in a slow, knowing smile—she’s aware of the effect she has. The way her thigh brushes against the silk, the teasing dip of her neckline, the way her fingers trace idle patterns on the bed… she’s not just lying down. She’s waiting.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
